Title: 3D Head tracking using MS Kinect SDK + WPF
Description: Head3D makes it easier for MS Kinect SDK developers to Make 3D Head Tracking Apps. You'll no longer have to make it from scratch again. It's developed in C# using WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Head3D makes it easier for MS Kinect SDK developers to Make 3D Head Tracking Apps. You'll no longer have to make it from scratch again. It's developed in C# using WPF.

Head3D is based on WpfHeadTracking project:

Head3D project is only a Kinect SDK port for WpfHeadTracking project which developed by Roberto Sonnino and Bruno França dos Reis (Project's home: http://wpfheadtracking.codeplex.com/ ) where they have made a version for both Mouse and Wiimote. Simply, after I read their simple code I decided to add Kinect version (port) for MS Kinect SDK developers. 

Credits

This project was developed by:

  • Mohammad Alansari (Bo_Ansari) - Kinect version: Interactivity
  • Roberto Sonnino: robertosonnino
